body_html: I've just created a pull request with a partial implementation that adds torch.iinfo(dtype) and torch.finfo(dtype). The implementation makes it possible to add a torch.dtype_info(dtype) later on if needed.
body_text: I've just created a pull request with a partial implementation that adds torch.iinfo(dtype) and torch.finfo(dtype). The implementation makes it possible to add a torch.dtype_info(dtype) later on if needed.
body: I've just created a pull request with a partial implementation that adds `torch.iinfo(dtype)` and `torch.finfo(dtype)`. The implementation makes it possible to add a torch.dtype_info(dtype) later on if needed.
